I really loved this story, it did get a bit repetitive in the end, but it still felt unique. The art is obviously not 10/10 but it's certainly a breath of fresh air because the story was awesome, and I got bored from looking at the same perfect art over and over again. And also, the way they fuck is romantic as fuck, hugging, kissing, bathing together, the artist has good taste. Thus, it complements the art for me. So I give the art 7/10, story 9/10, and a would fap again award with a perfect score of 5/7 three fitty.

If I took out the (way too prominent) dialogue boxes you literally wouldn't even be able to tell that it's about gender role reversal. Well it's probably obvious to the author that focusing so much on irrelevant details is a problem for him but because his art is lacking so much im guessing he makes up for it with alot of story details. An example of this "Gender role reversal" done perfectly would be Rebis [Teisou Gyakuten Goudou] Book, An amazing story concept WITH amazing art & it gives you minor details about the world but not to much & by leaving out the unnesscary details it leaves so much to be desired/anticipated. That 17 page book is probably as close to perfect as you're going to get.

The concept this series presented is fucking amazing my only problem is the author focuses to much on realization, For example almost every scene the Main character is wearing a condom & there are alot of facts just about the world in general, It's shit like those that broke my immersion in the story. I would DEFINITELY appreciate these facts IF it were a regular story but it's not. It's a fucking H-manga stop focusing on being so realistic & focus more on the sex scenes & experiences in sexual encounters.
